info.name: Monday.com Dark Mode
info.description: Dark UI for users of Monday boards (monday.com)
info.additionalInfo:
1. Version 1.1.0 - Add basic support for Monday's new style / layout. From my tests, this styling works with both the default layout and the new layout.
  2. Version 1.0.4 - Minor tweaks related to new / updated features introduced by Monday
  3. Version 1.0.3 - Minor misc tweaks
  4. Version 1.0.2 - Style "My Week" page; misc tweaks
  5. Version 1.0.1 - Add a few small details that were missed initially
  6. Version 1.0.0 - This is a pretty comprehensive first release. Note that there are, however, some of the lesser used pages / functionality that I haven't fully skinned yet.

data.title: Found a glitch/bug with the theme
